about_the_game:
RTX Sweeper

Welcome to the captivating world of RTX Sweeper! Get ready for a fresh and exhilarating gameplay experience that will put your logical prowess to the ultimate test. In this modern twist on the classic game of Minesweeper, you'll embark on a thrilling adventure with innovative gameplay that feels entirely new.


In RTX Sweeper, your mission is to navigate a dynamic virtual landscape and conquer mind-boggling puzzles. Armed with your sharp intellect and keen problem-solving skills, you'll uncover hidden secrets and overcome challenging obstacles within the game's captivating design.

Plenty of difficulties

Prepare to encounter a variety of complex puzzles, each more intriguing than the last. As you explore the grid of tiles, your objective is to strategically unveil safe zones while avoiding hidden hazards. Each calculated move will provide valuable information to aid you in your mission, but be cautious, as a single misstep could lead to failure.


RTX Sweeper offers a range of difficulty levels, catering to both puzzle enthusiasts and newcomers alike. With each triumph, you'll unlock increasingly demanding levels, pushing the limits of your logical thinking and problem-solving abilities. Unleash your analytical skills as you navigate through the game's captivating labyrinth.

Innovative gameplay modes

Get ready to be captivated by the fresh and innovative gameplay of RTX Sweeper. With its engaging puzzles and thrilling mechanics, it offers a whole new perspective on the classic Minesweeper concept, ensuring an exciting and immersive gaming experience.

What RTX Sweeper has to offer

  • A full free to play experience
  • Multiple environments
  • Puzzles with plenty of difficulties
  • Unique minesweeper mechanics
  • Boss battles
  • Unlocks based on progress
  • An official starting guide
  • An official speedruns category
  • Plenty of big free updates in the future
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • Ray tracing (although it is very minimal and experimental)
  • ... and more!

Free to play

Do you have what it takes to conquer the perplexing puzzles of RTX Sweeper? Only those with razor-sharp intellects and unwavering determination will emerge victorious. Step into a world of fresh and new gameplay, and embrace the challenge that awaits in RTX Sweeper!

Join our Discord for more!

name: RTX Sweeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-3570K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 780ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
  • Additional Notes: DirectX12 contains the ray tracing features

supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Hindi
